name: Breaking ball
description:
Breaking Ball is a game that is inspired by one of our childhood favorites called Slime Soccer.

Gameplay
Breaking Ball is a fun and quick local multiplayer game. The gameplay is almost as simple as Pong. Breaking Ball contains 5 maps and 9 different characters to choose from. To win the game you simply have to score more goals than your opponent before the match is over.
The game is Local multiplayer only.

DevelopmentAt the moment Breaking Ball is only a side project which means that all our design and development is done in the late night hours, but that also means that you'll get the game for free.

Thanks
We hope you want try out Breaking Ball, remember it is free! Your support matters and will help us stay motivated while developing the game. If you have any suggestions, let us know in the comments.

You can always find the latest updates about the game on http://breakingballgame.com/
